text: Hergiswil is a municipality in the canton of Nidwalden in Switzerland. It was founded in 1378. The main sights of Hergiswil are: an old clergy house, the church, the chapel Maria zum guten Rat, old mansion Thumigerhaus, and a glazier's workshop with museum. The workshop was established in 1817. It burned down on one occasion. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Homepage of Hergiswil *Official Homepage of the Glasi in Hergiswil *Glasi Ecuador site Category:Municipalities of Nidwalden
title: Hergiswil
